description: The CP210x USB to UART Bridge Virtual COM Port (VCP) drivers are required for device operation as a Virtual COM Port to facilitate host communication with [CP210x](https://www.silabs.com/products/interface/usb-bridges) products.
displayName: CP210x USB to UART Bridge VCP Drivers (Install)
summary: This package provides Virtual COM Port driver for CP210x devices
author: Silicon Laboratories
